verses.text: Ascribe to the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, you heavenly beings, ascribe to the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*glory and power
Ascribe to the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*the glory he manifests: bow to the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*in holy array.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice peals on the waters. The God of glory has thundered. He peals o’er the mighty waters.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice sounds with strength, the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice sounds with majesty.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice breaks the cedars, he breaks the cedars of Lebanon,
making Lebanon dance like a calf, Sirion like a young wild ox.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice hews out flames of fire.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice rends the desert, he rends the desert of Kadesh.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*’s voice whirls the oaks, and strips the forests bare; and all in his temple say “Glory.”
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*was king at the flood, the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*sits throned forever.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*gives strength to his people, he blesses his people with peace.
